snippets.title: While Loop
snippets.description: A loop that repeats while a condition is true

snippets.title: While Loop
snippets.description: A loop that repeats while a condition is true
snippets.code:
i = 0
while i < 10:
    print(i)
    i += 1

snippets.title: While Loop

snippets.title: While Loop
snippets.description: A loop that repeats while a condition is true
snippets.code:
i = 0
while i < 10 do
    print(i)
    i = i + 1
end

snippets.title: Async/Await
snippets.description: Asynchronous operations with coroutine handling
snippets.code:
import asyncio

async def fetch_data():
    try:
        data = await some_async_function()
        print(data)
    except Exception as e:
        print(e)

snippets.title: Queue

queue.popleft()
